name: Rug of Smothering
movement: 10 ft., can roll towards a target
description: A large, decorative rug that springs to life to grapple and suffocate its victims with its constricting folds.
memorable: It hides in plain sight as a normal rug until an unsuspecting victim triggers its attack.
goals: To ambush and incapacitate intruders by grappling and smothering them.
relations: Often found in enchanted homes or dungeons where they serve as traps.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage; condition immunities include being blinded, charmed, or paralyzed.
weaknesses: Susceptible to dispel magic, and can be incapacitated in an antimagic field.
attacks: Smother attack that grapples and restrains victims; Squeeze action that deals bludgeoning damage to grappled creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Damage Transfer allows it to take only half damage while grappling a creature.
senses: Blindsight out to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its environment despite being blind beyond this radius.
additional_information: Operates continuously without the need for air or food
Can mimic a normal rug when motionless
Excellent ambusher due to deceptive appearance
Can roll to engage targets from a distance when damaged
Requires a DC 19 to destroy with dispel magic
